info: Head bank for the generated event
Lund header bank for the generated event

items.name: npart
items.info: number of particles in the event (User Defined)

items.name: atarget
items.info: Mass number of the target (User Defined)

items.name: ztarget
items.info: Atomic number oif the target (User Defined)

items.name: daughter
items.info: index of the first daughter (User Defined)

items.name: pid
items.info: ID of the first particle entering the sensitive volume

items.name: mpid
items.info: ID of the mother of the first particle entering the sensitive volume

items.name: tid
items.info: Track ID of the first particle entering the sensitive volume

items.name: mtid
items.info: Track ID of the mother of the first particle entering the sensitive volume

items.name: otid
items.info: Track ID of the original track that generated the first particle entering the sensitive volume

items.name: avgX
items.info: Average X position in global reference system

items.name: avgY
items.info: Average Y position in global reference system

items.name: avgZ
items.info: Average Z position in global reference system

items.name: avgLx
items.info: Average X position in local reference system

items.name: avgLy
items.info: Average Y position in local reference system

items.name: avgLz
items.info: Average Z position in local reference system

items.name: px
items.info: x component of momentum of the particle entering the sensitive volume

items.name: py
items.info: y component of momentum of the particle entering the sensitive volume

items.name: pz
items.info: z component of momentum of the particle entering the sensitive volume

items.name: vx
items.info: x component of primary vertex of the particle entering the sensitive volume

items.name: vy
items.info: y component of primary vertex of the particle entering the sensitive volume

items.name: vz
items.info: z component of primary vertex of the particle entering the sensitive volume

items.name: mvx
items.info: x component of primary vertex of the mother of the particle entering the sensitive volume

items.name: mvy
items.info: y component of primary vertex of the mother of the particle entering the sensitive volume

items.name: mvz
items.info: z component of primary vertex of the mother of the particle entering the sensitive volume

items.name: procID
items.info: Process that created the FP. see gemc.jlab.org

items.name: mcTindex
items.info: MC Particle index, as in tid

items.name: MCLayersTrk
items.info: layers of tracker (mostly)  detectors that a given MCParticle hit. Each layer corresponds to a specific bit in this variable

items.name: MCLayersNeut
items.info: layers of detectors (non tracker) that a givem MCParticle hit. Each layer corresponds to a specific bit in this variable

items.name: RecLayersTrk
items.info: layers of tracker detectors (mostly) that, the matched RecParticle picked hits from

items.name: RecLayersNeut
items.info: layers of detectors (mostly) that, the matched RecParticle picked hits from
